price: 163. Azali na mosangani te, mpo na yango nde na tindamaki mpe na zali wa yambo ya bamisokié (nazali moto wa yambo ya kozala mizilima na umma na ngai).
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
